Posts.Content: Mar 25, 2009 02:20AM jtaylor007 wrote: There have been more extensive studies surrounding prone positioning and the preliminary results are outstanding.  I work for a manufacturer of both supine and prone positioning devices and will admit that many centers are moving towards prone... and not necessarily just for pendulous breasted women.  If you google 'prone breast system' - you should find a pink one that I work with.   Ask the questions you have on your mind to your Rad Onco docs without fear.  It is their job to know the latest techniques without relying on what they learned in medical school.
Posts.Title: Radiation treatment in a prone (face-down) position... otter whatsnext17
